lines.text:
[about to kill Stanley]
Suck it, bitch!
I don't like it when people yell at me for no reason at *all*.

[after being mutilated]
It won't stop bleeding!
That's so sweet, it's painful.

[while throwing a broken tree limb at Andy and Stanley]
BASTARDS!
[after his gang beats and rapes Jennifer]
Total submission. That's what I like in a woman - total submission.
Y'know, sometimes I look at these gorgeous-looking chicks, I mean the ones that look like real knockouts, sexy and all... and I wonder... I wonder if they gotta take a shit, too.
Hey, all women shit, women are full of shit.
Not my mother!
My sister is.
Aw, man, cut out the shit talk!

[to Jennifer after she pulls a gun and tells him to take off his clothes]
I don't like women giving me orders.

[while raping Jennifer]
I can't come. I can't come! You're interrupting my concentration!

[screaming in pain after being castrated by Jennifer]
AW, JESUS! JUST TAKE A LOOK OF WHAT YOU'VE DONE TO ME! OH, GOD! OH! *OH, GO-O-O-O-D!*
[continues screaming and crying in agony as Jennifer walks out of the bathroom and locks the door]

[laughing as Matthew is naked raping Jennifer]
Take off your fuckin' glasses, Matthew!
He can't see without his fucking glasses!
Wielding a knife to attempt to kill Jennifer a second time I HATE you! You've brought nothing but BAD luck with you!
I have no friends because of you!
calmly What about me, Matthew? We were going to be friends. Remember?
You love your kids?
Sure I do.
And your wife?
She's okay.
